short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sourcengine's browser extension is your digital procurement assistant.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Sourcengine browser extension serves as your intelligent procurement companion, always on the lookout for the most optimal deals.

When you’re navigating other distributor websites, it taps into structured content exposed to search engines, identifying the Manufacturer Part Number (MPN) and the manufacturer itself. Without needing to leave the site you’re on, our extension instantly displays comprehensive Sourcengine and Datalynq data about the part in a convenient browser popup.

Whether or not Sourcengine is your starting point, our extension drastically reduces the time and effort it takes to compare prices, enabling more informed and cost-effective decisions. Ideal for procurement professionals, this tool puts crucial data at your fingertips, augmenting your procurement strategy.

By using the Sourcengine browser extension, you agree to Sourcengine’s terms and conditions. (https://www.sourcengine.com/termsandconditions) 
 
Disclaimer: 
This extension uses Google Analytics to collect extension usage statistics to help improve user experience. If you want to opt-out of Google Analytics tracking, please visit http://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout or you can set up a filter in Adblock Plus or similar ad blocker tools like AdBlock, uBlock or Adblock Pro.
